name: J. Arena Ex
description:
Try and survive the arena. Watch out for explosions and fire spreading in every directions! Robots are after your life, shoot them down or they will get you.

Controls

WASD: Move

Space: Use your fire extinguisher

Left-click: Shoot grenade

Right-click: Shoot boomerang

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2018 with the collaboration of Raphaël Belan-Renaud, Dominic Lachance-Robidoux and Jimmy Pham.
